text: Mwebwe mwemeye Imana yanyu y’ukuri, mwararonkejwe uruhusha rw’ukwihora ku bantu bishwe, uwidegemvya kuwidegemvya, n’uwuri mubuja hamwe n’uwuri muribwo, n’umukenyezi n’uwundi n’uwugiriwe imbabazi namwene wabo yababaye cane, rero nafatwe neza mukuriha n’ubwitonzi nawe arihe n’ubundi bwitonzi, uku niko kworoheza kuvuye k’Umuremyi wanyu n’impuhwe zayo, nayo uwuzorenga imbibe zayo munyuma y’ibi vyose uyo muntu azoronka ibihano bibabaza cane
